definition: the one and only way/the only proper course to take
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: A monetary rule is a requisite for restoring the Fed’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 货币规则是重建美联储独立性的不二法门。

sentences.english: The first rule in winning is to participate!
sentences.chinese: 参与是获得胜利的不二法门。

sentences.english: Images are agood way to catch a visitors attention.
sentences.chinese: 图像历来是吸引眼球的不二法门。

sentences.english: Take in fewer calories than you burn, and you lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 吃得比你消耗的少，是减肥的不二法门。

sentences.english: The man is the only proper course to take, should never let him meet.
sentences.chinese: 抓住男人的不二法门，应该就是，永远不要让他满足。

sentences.english: And it's an ideal way to gain customers with a vested emotional interest in your success.
sentences.chinese: 赢得有既定情感兴趣的消费者，是成功的不二法门。

sentences.english: Keen observation is the key to winning this game.
sentences.chinese: 观察入微是赢得这场游戏的不二法门。

sentences.english: As always, love is the solution to everything.
sentences.chinese: 同往常一样，爱是解决一切的不二法门。

sentences.english: Large-scale government aid looks like the only way to end the economic nosedive .
sentences.chinese: 大规模政府援助看来是终结经济猛跌的不二法门。

definition: the key trick/the secret of success
the Way of the King/statecraft/benevolent rule/virtuous as opposed to the Way of Hegemon 霸道
the best policy/the best thing one can do in the circumstances
the road one must follow or take/the only way
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
the gist (of a text or argument)/the main points
